title: I’m Ghost
lyrics: And leave the city behind us
Straight outta Compton, you need a compass to find us
Waters that blue and people call me "your highness"
Prince of Zamunda, you get in tune with the lions
Away from the rumors and those who assume what I am
Hawthorne to Hollywood to Hawaiian
Beaches, I'm in the reach of ninety-degree climate
And sweet beautiful sounds of CeCe Winans
Mm, GLC LK slash G-Wagen drivin'
I'm a L-A-M-B-O, hoppin' out, cool on autopilot
Smooth as babies' bottoms with Johnson baby powder
Hey, coward
Suck a big dick with AIDS on the tip
No homo, y'all just make me sick
I'm ready for war
I got my rifle, my sword
Blueprint mapped out, this is what's it all about
But for now, cop a suite out in Singapore
Piña colada with umbrella straws, I'm tellin' y'all
This is Big K, nigga
Big clip in broad day, nigga
Big K, wave it your way, nigga
Nigga, I'm gone, nigga, I'm ghost
'Bout to touch down on a whole 'nother coast
Jumpin' off planes, hoppin' on boats
Go'n throw it up, then, nigga, let's toast
Nigga, I'm gone, nigga, I'm ghost
'Bout to touch down on a whole 'nother coast
Jumpin' off planes, hoppin' on boats
Even when I'm gone, though, my heart still close
(Jerz)
Out the hood, now I'm walkin' through that white sand
With some Latin women who winnin', watchin' 'em belly dance (Oh)
I got a belly ache, I'm eatin' too fast (Yeah)
I can't slow down, they force feedin' me the cash (Hah)
I got a big appetite, so I chow down (Down)
Pocket full of hundreds, fuck it, I'm a boss now (Now)
I make boss moves (Moves), bitch, I'm overseas ('Seas)
Fuckin' on foreign bitches, blowin' foreign trees
Amsterdam, maybe Oslo, Norway
I do me, I give a damn what a whore say (Nah)
True P, pinstripes like Jorge (Yeah)
Yankees fitted on, glidin' to the doorway (Let's go)
Hah, yeah, I'm back on that gully shit
Number-one hustler to get money with (Jerz)
N. Jerzey Devil, yeah, you heard me
Play your game for now, but, trust, I end it early (Right)
Exit out this fake shit, no frills
Gotta get back to reality, travelin' through the hills (Yeah)
Bitch, I'm outta here, deuces, peace
Vete pa'l carajo, adiós, capeesh
Nigga, I'm gone, nigga, I'm ghost
'Bout to touch down on a whole 'nother coast
Jumpin' off planes, hoppin' on boats
Go'n throw it up, then, nigga, let's toast
Nigga, I'm gone, nigga, I'm ghost
'Bout to touch down on a whole 'nother coast
Jumpin' off planes, hoppin' on boats
Even when I'm gone, though, my heart still close
